member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.GetBaseClass
member.summary: Gets an interface containing the variable base class type.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.GetDesc
member.summary: Get the description of a shader-reflection-variable type.
member.param: A pointer to a shader-type description (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 11 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.GetMemberTypeByIndex
member.summary: Get a shader-reflection-variable type by index.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.GetMemberTypeByName
member.summary: Get a shader-reflection-variable type by name.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.GetSubType
member.summary: Gets the base class of a class.
member.returns: Returns a pointer to a containing the base class type. Returns NULL if the class does not have a base class.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.ImplementsInterface
member.summary: Indicates whether a class type implements an interface.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the interface is implemented; otherwise return S_FALSE.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.IsEqual
member.summary: Indicates whether two pointers have the same underlying type.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the pointers have the same underlying type; otherwise returns S_FALSE.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType.IsOfType
member.summary: Indicates whether a variable is of the specified type.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if object being queried is equal to or inherits from the type in the pType parameter; otherwise returns S_FALSE.

member.name: ID3D11ShaderReflectionType
member.summary: This shader-reflection interface provides access to variable type.
